education_text.0: Abramsky was educated at      Hasmonean High School Hasmonean Grammar School for Boys,      Hendon and at   Since 2021, Abramsky is Professor of Computer Science at      University College London University College LondonSince 2021, Abramsky is Professor of Computer Science at      University College London University College LondonSamson Abramsky edited 6 Volumes Handbook of Logic in Computer Science with      Dov Gabbay Dov Gabbay and      Tom Maibaum Tom Maibaum
